title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying it.
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog box and directly modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog box. 
5. [No additional information provided.]
OB: The current observed behavior is not specified.
EB: The expected behavior is not specified.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are not complete after step 4. Please provide details on what actions or observations are expected in this step and any subsequent steps.
